application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted unacceptable information for the discharge of Condition 6 (Pre-occ sust. evidence) of planning permission ref: 22/03137/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to be in the interests of sustainability and energy conservation, in accordance with policy SI.2 and SI.5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 8 (Pre-occ waste details) of planning permission ref: 22/03137/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with policy SI.7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 9 (Pre-occ cycle parking details) of planning permission ref: 22/03137/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure the provision of satisfactory cycle storage facilities and in the interests of highway safety in accordance with Policy DM8 (Sustainable Transport for New Developments) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Details required by conditions 6 (Pre-occ sust. evidence), 8 (Pre-occ waste details), 9 (Pre-occ cycle parking details) and 14 (Pre-occ fire safety strategy) of permission 22/03137/FUL (Erection of two storey new dwellinghouse to side of 25 Motspur Park.)
